role.argrole: entity arg0 gives away in exchange for arg1

example.parse: (IP (NP-SBJ (NP (ADJP (JJ 良)) (NP (NN 茶))) (CC 或) (NP (ADJP (JJ 劣)) (NP (NN 茶)))) (PU ，) (VP (ADVP (AD 都)) (VP (VV 能) (VP (VV 换得) (NP-OBJ (QP (CD 一) (CLP (M 笔))) (ADJP (JJ 好)) (NP (NN 收益)))))))
example.arg: 一 笔 好 收益
良 茶 或 劣 茶
